channel.title: Mopar abuse(or w.e. its called) system
channel.description:
You can post malware and not receive bans/mutes but you argue and you get mutes etc?
An example not trying to single out deathchaos9, its just an example http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548967.0.html
Me thinks posting malware should be a mute, browsing mopar I see this constantly..
Discuss.
